pull.title: Minor send buffer changes
pull.body:
- fix #1544
- Change send buffer default to 1M, as the send buffer is more often maxed now.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Bitcoin (dont fork from here, fork from bitcoin/bitcoin)

events.body: Has someone tried syncing a node connect=ed to a peer running this?

issue.title: Minor send buffer changes
issue.body:
Change send buffer default to 1M, as the send buffer is more often maxed now.
Taken from #[1545](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/1545) on bitcoin

issue.title: Stop processing messages on full send buffer and dont disconnect
issue.body:
Decrease default send/revieve buffer from 10MB to 5MB as this patch makes it easy for a node to fill both instead of only send. Ported from [pull 973](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/973)

The largest advantage is not having to read from disk or serialize blocks on getblocks requests.
